rules_text:
Flying, menace
[i]King of Kilvas[/i] – Creature spells you cast with flying cost {2} less to cast. Whenever you cast a creature spell with flying, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.
[i]Raven Lord[/i] – Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you surveil 1.
Partner with Tibarn, Lord of the Air
